title: Teasing Beth (Her Boss Dominates Her After Hours)
description: Beth's been part of Daniel's office team for as long as she can remember. When his PA takes a vacation, Beth's expected to step up to the plate and make sure his appointments are booked and his work's properly organized. Sensing that her mind's not completely on the job, Daniel keeps Beth behind after hours to talk things through.Daniel discovers that Beth's loser boyfriend's broken up with her and she has a whole lot of stress that needs relieving. An alpha, dominant man is exactly what Beth needs, and with the office locked and the lights low, Daniel clears his desk and introduces her to a kind of attention and relaxation that she's never experienced before.Office Surrender is a collection of standalone short stories featuring Dominant men - and women who learn to submit.
author: Ruby Harper
